text:

title: Gerry Ryan
text:
Red-headed vulture nesting habitat in Cambodian dry tropical forest


I’m a researcher using modelling methods to support decision making in public health and conservation science.

My research is around modelling mosquito distributions to inform malaria control with the Vector Atlas, as well as other problems in infectious diseases.
I have expertise in:

population dynamics of wildlife and infectious diseases
species distribution modelling and dynamics
risk assessment

I work at the Infectious Disease Ecology and Modelling team the Telethon Kids Institute
I sit with with the Infectious Disease Dynamics Unit at the Melbourne School of Global and Population Health, University of Melbourne

Stalk me further:

Publications
Google Scholar
ORCID: 0000-0003-0183-7630
github
Email me: gerard.ryan@telethonkids.org.au
